summary: Removed undiscovered locations and quest markers from hud menu.
descriptionHtml:
This mod does a few things:
1) Removes any undiscovered locations from your compass
2) Remove Quest pointers from the compass
3) Still supports your personal map marker. If you don\'t want that marker, remove it from your map. 
4) Variant 1: Supports FOUND places on the compass and enemies
5) Variant 2: Removes FOUND places from the compass but enemies show up on compass
6) Variant 3: Removes FOUND places and enemies from compass

This does not alter the MAP in any way.
author: Mofomojo

files.name: MofoMojo Slight Hardcore Compass Mod v1
